See the License for the specific language governing rights * and limitations under the License. * The Original Code is Compiere ERP & Business Solution * The Initial Developer of the Original Code is Jorg Janke and ComPiere, Inc. * Portions created by Jorg Janke are Copyright (C) 1999-2001 Jorg Janke, * parts created by ComPiere are Copyright (C) ComPiere, Inc.; * All Rights Reserved. * Contributor(s): Openbravo SL * Contributions are Copyright (C) 1999-2005 Openbravo, S.L ************************************************************************* * $Id: AD_Window_Trl_Trg.sql,v 1.4 2003/02/18 03:33:22 jjanke Exp $ *** * Title: Window Trl Changes * Description: * - Update Translation in Menu + Workflow ************************************************************************/ BEGIN -- Update Menu UPDATE AD_Menu_Trl SET Name=:new.Name, Description=:new.Description WHERE AD_Language=:new.AD_Language AND EXISTS ( SELECT * FROM AD_Menu m WHERE m.AD_Menu_ID=AD_Menu_Trl.AD_Menu_ID AND m.AD_Window_ID=:new.AD_Window_ID ) ; -- Update Workflow UPDATE AD_WF_Node_Trl SET Name=:new.Name, Description=:new.Description, Help=:new.Help WHERE AD_Language=:new.AD_Language AND EXISTS ( SELECT * FROM AD_WF_Node n WHERE n.AD_WF_Node_ID=AD_WF_Node_Trl.AD_WF_Node_ID AND n.AD_Window_ID=:new.AD_Window_ID AND n.IsCentrallyMaintained='Y' ) ; -- END AD_Window_Trl_Trg
